SEARCH
Package com.example.projectv2.Controller

Class FacilityController

java.lang.Object
com.example.projectv2.Controller.FacilityController
public class FacilityController extends Object
Controller for handling facility-related operations in Firestore. This class provides methods to create, add, and retrieve facilities.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    FacilityController.FacilityCallback
    Callback interface for facility-related operations to communicate results back to the calling class.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    FacilityController(android.content.Context context)
    Constructs a FacilityController with the given context, initializing the Firestore database instance.

    Description

    addFacilityToFirestore(Facility facility, FacilityController.FacilityCallback callback)
    Adds a facility to the Firestore database.
    void
    createFacility(String owner, String name, String description, String id, FacilityController.FacilityCallback callback)
    Creates a new facility with the specified details and saves it to Firestore.
    void
    fetchAllFacilities(FacilityController.FacilityCallback callback)
    Fetches the list of all facilities from Firestore and notifies the callback with the facility data.
    void
    fetchUserFacilities(FacilityController.FacilityCallback callback)
    Fetches the list of all the user's facilities from Firestore and notifies the callback with the facility data.

    • FacilityController

      public FacilityController(android.content.Context context)
      Constructs a FacilityController with the given context, initializing the Firestore database instance.

  • Method Details

    • createFacility

      public void createFacility(String owner, String name, String description, String id, FacilityController.FacilityCallback callback)
      Creates a new facility with the specified details and saves it to Firestore.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the facility
      description - a description of the facility
      id - the unique ID of the facility
      callback - callback to handle success or error

    • addFacilityToFirestore

      public void addFacilityToFirestore(Facility facility, FacilityController.FacilityCallback callback)
      Adds a facility to the Firestore database.
      Parameters:
      facility - the Facility object to add to Firestore
      callback - callback to handle success or error

    • fetchUserFacilities

      public void fetchUserFacilities(FacilityController.FacilityCallback callback)
      Fetches the list of all the user's facilities from Firestore and notifies the callback with the facility data.
      Parameters:
      callback - callback to handle the loaded facilities or errors

    • fetchAllFacilities

      public void fetchAllFacilities(FacilityController.FacilityCallback callback)
      Fetches the list of all facilities from Firestore and notifies the callback with the facility data.
      Parameters:
      callback - callback to handle the loaded facilities or errors
